label: AB_oP16_61_c_c-002
title: Cyanogen [(CN)$_{2}$] Structure
comments:
We use the data for solid cyanogen at $-95^\circ$C from (Parkes, 1963). 
 (Parkes, 1963) give the structure in the $Pcab$ setting of space group \#61.  We rotated this $90^\circ$ about the $y$-axis to transform this to the standard $Pbca$ setting. 
 This structure has the same AFLOW label as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oP16_61_c_c-001}{$B_{e}$, CdSb}. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
